tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE space_missions (
  mission_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  launch_date DATE NOT NULL,
  destination VARCHAR(50),
  mission_success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE space_missions (
    mission_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    mission_date DATE,
    launch_site VARCHAR(100),
    mission_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE spacex_launches (
  launch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_id INT,
  launch_date DATE,
  rocket_name VARCHAR(100),
  launch_success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE SpaceMissions (
  mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  mission_date DATE,
  mission_destination VARCHAR(100),
  mission_success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE MissionCrew (
  crew_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_id INT,
  crew_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  crew_role VARCHAR(50),
  crew_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE MissionData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_id INT,
  data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  data_value VARCHAR(255),
  data_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Spacecraft (
  spacecraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  spacecraft_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  spacecraft_type VARCHAR(50),
  spacecraft_status VARCHAR(50),
  mission_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE space_missions (
  mission_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  launch_date DATE,
  destination VARCHAR(100),
  mission_success BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE astronauts (
  astronaut_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  astronaut_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  birth_date DATE,
  nationality VARCHAR(100),
  missions_completed INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE spacecrafts (
  craft_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  craft_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
  launch_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE missions_timeline (
  event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  event_description TEXT,
  mission_id INTEGER REFERENCES space_missions(mission_id),
  astronaut_id INTEGER REFERENCES astronauts(astronaut_id)
)

CREATE TABLE mission_images (
  image_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  image_url TEXT,
  mission_id INTEGER REFERENCES space_missions(mission_id),
  craft_id INTEGER REFERENCES spacecrafts(craft_id)
)
